snippet: With deadlines looming for the health care law, the Obama administration has recruited Chris Jennings, a former chief health policy adviser to President Bill Clinton.
abstract: Obama administration, in effort to put president's health care program back on track, recruits Chris Jennings as health policy coordinator and strategist; he is a former chief health policy adviser to Pres Bill Clinton.
lead_paragraph: With deadlines looming for the health care law, the Obama administration has recruited Chris Jennings, a former chief health policy adviser to President Bill Clinton.

headline.main: Clinton Aide Joins Obama on Health Care
headline.print_headline: Clinton Aide Joins Obama on Health Care

keywords.value: Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act (2010)
keywords.name: subject
